content: all right players we're about to start the combat everybody get your dice ready
tired of crazy dice rollers destroying your carefully set up game table
delaying your game and maiming other players the bowler the flinger the
and the beggar just a snap and all your problems are solved with romatic the
easy dice containment system just insert the die in the padded high-impact cup
apply the restraining lid to stop all dice shenanigans at the table no more
bowling flinging spinning searching so are we go ahead and go pitchers today
only three easy payments of 1995 send all payments to the DMS craft care of DM
Scotty Rolla Matic chairman and founder act today and you get a second set
